mapper.insert: INSERT INTO theater(theater_id, theater_name, address, number) VALUES (#{theaterId}, #{theaterName}, #{address}, #{number})
mapper.update: update theater set theater_name=#{theaterName}, address=#{address}, number=#{number} where theater_id=#{theaterId}
update sangyounggwan as a, time as b set a.theater_name=#{afterTheaterName}, b.theater_name=#{afterTheaterName} where a.theater_name=#{beforeTheaterName} and b.theater_name=#{beforeTheaterName}
update sangyounggwan set syg_id = replace(syg_id, #{strBefore},#{strAfter}) where syg_id like concat('%',#{strBefore},'%')
update time set syg_id = replace(syg_id, #{strBefore},#{strAfter}) where syg_id like concat('%',#{strBefore},'%')
